title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When viewing the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters are not displayed.
EB: The default values for the report parameters should be shown in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters and only set default values for them. 2. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 3. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and observe that the default values are not displayed.
